body_html:
@fmassa Thanks!

  1. Any suggestions on what to use instead? I was hoping not to roll my own for loops and find an equivalent of keras' fit_generator
  2. Would you happen to know the reasons for its deprecation? I couldn't find much info about it online.
    Feel free to close this issue as won't fix.

body:
@fmassa Thanks! 
1) Any suggestions on what to use instead? I was hoping not to roll my own for loops and find an equivalent of keras' [fit_generator](https://keras.io/models/sequential/#fit_generator)
2) Would you happen to know the reasons for its deprecation? I couldn't find much info about it online.
Feel free to close this issue as won't fix.
